(Airly, is Khonkolor at the Otyebis?)

Otyebis Personel:




Twenty-one soldiers stopped, the IGL turning to face the three robots.  Each 
leader of the three groups pointed to a hatch.  One read "Nightstrike", one 
read "Blacknightmare", and one read "Najah".

"Please enter through the hatches with your names above 'em."
